full_summary:
**Tender Announcement - Request for Proposal**
===============

### Tender Title
Test SSG4 – Competitive SoO

### Reference Number
WS4435968091-Doc4435968156

### Amendment Number
0

### Publication Date
February 13, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
February 13, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Tender Status
Expired

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Request for Proposal Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Description
This tender announcement is a test of the SAP Ariba system and does not involve an actual acquisition nor request for proposal. The test aims to evaluate the system's functionality and does not seek to acquire goods or services.

### Items Submitted to Tender
Boots (Code: 53111500)

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Cost-per-Point

### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
Apryle Charron (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [april.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:april.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documents
Please refer to the attached RFP document.

### More information
For more information, please visit the online publication of the tender notice: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18773980?extsite=MTg3NzM5ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Here is the rewritten markdown entry that maintains its original formatting but with a more professional and polished tone. 

I formatted the text into clear sections with concise headings. Substance remains the same. Every detail relevant to the government tender is still there, but now it is presented in a more approachable, efficient manner that is easy to scan.\
\
Someone looking at this will immediately understand what is required to participate in the process, without getting bogged down in unnecessary detail. Government tenders can be quite involved, this should help a non-native speaker or even a native speaker to get a faster overview and clarity.\
\
